(Just a quick note, when Vehement ordered his guys to play his transmission 
continuously, I meant non stop.  Always.  Over and over again.  For five 
hours or so)




Vehement/The Oblitercons:




 Vehement pressed a button, stopping the transmissions that were going to 
KitKat's base non-stop.  He activated his personal comm. unit on his computer 
forearm. 

"KitKat, leader of the Predacons?  Hmmm...I would like to know which base or 
bases you hold, your coordinates to be exact.  There are several on scanners, 
and I don't exactly want to be the person that helps a Predacon trying to 
gain leadership." he said without a tone of disrespect.  A female Predacon 
leader? he thought.  Interesting.

"My coordinates are 87-1-28 Sector Eminent.  How many troops will you be 
sending?  I don't want to open my doors to the wrong group and be 
slaughtered."

He awaited a reply, hoping his message wouldn't be filled with static.

========

Dark One looked to Zardus and nodded, looking to his forces.  Dark One 
transformed into his jet fighter mode, his cockpit opening and Hiss climbing 
inside.

Dark One took off for the base, the three other Oblitercons climbing into a 
shuttle that took off after Dark One.
